post.body: okie dokie - I'm a follower of @my2gs now - although my kids think I am a bit on the freakish side... ; )
ooooh - here too! Busy week this week - lots of calls/showings.
say "Hi" to mom for me!
@rjtufano maybe I should buy some boobs....
very, very true. There are great things a brewin in 09.
we don't have any more tix in Jan :(
r u here? Caps are bringin it tonight!
I resolve to call you up, 1000 times a day....
awww...tell your daughter he'll be fine. Although @rjtufano has him burning in the inferno....
cha-ching.
yeah - tough to watch....he looks better better than in years past - can't listen though....
Resolving to come up with some resolutions ; )
Showing homes and writing contracts! Took me a bit to get moving today - too much time off over the past two weeks....
needs to be reminded that there are professionals that you can hire instead of spending days trying to take care of it personally....yeah.
off to paint some more.
Caps win it! Wtg boys!
getting ready for the caps game tonight with the fam. great way to start a new year!
Happy 2009!
anti climactic robbie jump. not quite his daddy.
